file_content.text: Looking good, Commander. A lot's happened since Denova.
The Mandalorians stand at my back, stronger than ever. And now they're hungry to join your cause. I'm here to make it official.
Hello, Commander. Don't worry. I'm not here to fight.
You insulted my name. Made we weak in the eyes of the Mandalorians. Now there's only one way I can prove my strength and reunite the clans.
I am Mandalore the Avenger--and I've come to join your fight.
It's an honor to fight alongside another Mandalorian.
I knew you would understand. Family is more than blood.
We're going to have a blast.
Remember your place, obey my orders, and you'll do fine.
The clans will sing ballads of our every victory
My first duty is to the clans. After that, I'll follow you to the end of the galaxy.
See you on the battlefield, brother.
See you on the battlefield, sister.
I demand obedience. If you want to join, you must respect my every order.
We're going to have so much fun.
